column4: After spending decades in cryogenic sleep
column5: the crew of the Spirit of Fire wake to find themselves on a Forerunner installation known as the Ark. But they are not alone.

column4: Explore a vast galaxy full of wonder. Paradox Development Studio
column5: makers of the Crusader Kings and Europa Universalis series presents Stellaris
column6: an evolution of the grand strategy genre.

column4: Age of Wonders: Planetfall is the new strategy game from Triumph Studios
